医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
NFL 球员只开出很少的阿片类药物来缓解疼痛由于职业的身体接触性质，美国国家橄榄球联盟 (NFL) 的精英运动员经常会感到疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/NFL-players-prescribed-very-few-opioids-for-pain-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/NFL-players-prescribed-very-few-opioids-for-pain-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96e17651-b5ac-4e84-9e73-68dd7be2ab29 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 13:26:10 -0500 NFL players prescribed very few opioids for pain management
开发人工智能聊天机器人以帮助政府应对耐药性科学家们开发了一种类似于 ChatGPT 的人工智能聊天机器人，以帮助政府制定有效的政策来对抗耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/AI-Chatbot-Deployed-To-Target-Drug-Resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/AI-Chatbot-Deployed-To-Target-Drug-Resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58309a3b-9392-40e3-a383-c30a3b431eb7 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:58:00 -0500 AI chatbot developed to aid governments in tackling drug resistance
炎性体保护干细胞免于癌变根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员的一项临床前研究，一组称为炎性体的免疫蛋白可以通过去除血液干细胞表面的某些受体并阻断癌症基因活性来帮助防止血液干细胞恶性化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Inflammasome-protects-stem-cells-from-becoming-cancerous.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Inflammasome-protects-stem-cells-from-becoming-cancerous.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5217e5a-be1f-49d2-87be-537c1ba18b52 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:49:54 -0500 Inflammasome protects stem cells from becoming cancerous
研究揭示寨卡病毒如何劫持宿主蛋白进行繁殖众所周知，蚊子传播的寨卡病毒会引起小头畸形，这是一种先天缺陷，大脑发育异常导致头部小于预期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-how-Zika-virus-hijacks-host- Protein-for-reproduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Study-reveals-how-Zika-virus-hijacks-host- Protein-for-reproduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41342f24-bb80-4bb3-baec-651c16d51f0c Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:34:00 -0500 Study reveals how Zika virus hijacks host protein for reproduction
新研究揭示了肝癌趋势的变化肝癌是全世界癌症相关死亡的主要原因，其发病率具有不同的地理模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-research-sheds-light-on-changing-liver-cancer-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-research-sheds-light-on-changing-liver-cancer-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ef71f57-d15c-4c49-805e-b41038f7a1e9 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:23:07 -0500 New research sheds light on changing liver cancer trends
ORACLE 测试增强了肺癌结果的预测伦敦大学学院癌症研究所和弗朗西斯·克里克研究所的研究人员开发的一项新测试可以在诊断时更好地预测肺癌生存率，这可以为治疗决策提供信息，并有可能降低癌症复发或扩散的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/ORACLE-test-enhances-prediction-of-lung-cancer-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/ORACLE-test-enhances-prediction-of-lung-cancer-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6f5b2e6-e401-4c0e-b45e-e65c2da95dc2 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 12:17:55 -0500 ORACLE test enhances prediction of lung cancer outcomes
新观点呼吁监管改革以应对美国医生罢工不断上升的趋势由哈佛朝圣者医疗保健研究所的研究人员领导的《新英格兰医学杂志》发表的新观点呼吁紧急进行监管改革，以应对美国医生罢工不断上升的趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-perspective-calls-for-regulatory-reforms-to-address-rising-trend-of-US-physical-strikes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/New-perspective-calls-for-regulatory-reforms-to-address-rising-trend-of-US-physical-strikes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10c74b78-2e86-4962-a748-2e6daa026ed3 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 09:00:14 -0500 New perspective calls for regulatory reforms to address rising trend of US physician strikes
极端天气事件对艾滋病毒预防和护理的影响研究人员回顾了与气候变化相关的极端天气事件对艾滋病毒策略的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/The-impact-of-extreme-weather-events-on-HIV-prevention-and-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/The-impact-of-extreme-weather-events-on-HIV-prevention-and-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fb85725-5109-47e1-8b90-884997726951 Mon, 13 Jan 2025 08:41:00 -0500 The impact of extreme weather events on HIV prevention and care
科学家揭开了金黄色葡萄球菌在人类中生存的遗传秘密迄今为止关于金黄色葡萄球菌这种常见细菌适应人体生存机制的最详细研究可能有助于改善某些感染的预防、诊断和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Scientists-uncover-genic-secrets-of-Staphylococcus-aureus-survival-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Scientists-uncover-genic-secrets-of-Staphylococcus-aureus-survival-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c89e9f0-c4ae-443a-8ff1-329e3652f09c Mon, 13 Jan 2025 08:30:31 -0500 Scientists uncover genetic secrets of Staphylococcus aureus survival in humans
女性在肺移植中的等待名单死亡率较高研究强调了肺移植方面的性别差异，表明女性面临更长的等待时间，但获得更好的移植后生存结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Women-experience-higher-waiting-list-mortality-in-lung-transplantation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250113/Women-experience-higher-waiting-list-mortality-in-lung-transplantation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=609a7bac-a1d2-492d-ad76-7149e4a17fab Mon, 13 Jan 2025 08:18:00 -0500 Women experience higher waiting-list mortality in lung transplantation
